Text: Bullshit BRrip :( What happened to real DVD releases. BRrip's suck. Allmost allways subs are all out of sync and all over the place and no real menus :(
Underworld: Awakening is set to be released on DVD on March 15, 2012. Then you can buy your own dvd release with real menus and other bullshit extras! :D
BRrips ought to be better than a regular DVD9 to DVD5-rip, yes? Not sure if it matters but it feels somehow better.
